title: NO LP gas distribution on Saturday (4); Litro
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas said that there will be “NO” domestic LP Gas Cylinder (12.5 kg, 5kg & 2.3kg) distribution on Saturday (4).
Litro further said that they will be receiving shipment soon in a few days.
Doctor pleads guilty for 2018 Accident that killed Police Officer; Ordered to pay Rs. 10 Mn to family
